item.description:
THIS Tuesday, Cassavettes (Americana/roots rock) are playing the early show (7-10PM) at TOAD, as part of their June residency. That's not too late for a "school night" and it's FREE. The Moving Co. plays the late show at 10PM.

Here's some info from www.myspace.com/cassavettes

Known for energetic, powerful live shows that crackle with the electricity of The Replacements, Old 97s, and The Rolling Stones, Cassavettes has turned more than a few heads, locally and beyond -- scooping up “Best Local Band” in the Boston Phoenix reader’s poll, a Boston Music Award nod for “Outstanding Americana Act,” and making a splash at South By Southwest 2007 and 2008 in Austin, Texas...

Toad is small (capacity 60), so I can't guarantee we'll get a table.

See toadcambridge.com for more info.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll mail my cell # to attendees
item.name: Tuesday @ TOAD: Cassavettes
